Author: MihailJ
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: Message from Founder, Jason J. Kim https://medium.com/@ebcoin/message-from-founder-jason-j-kim-4efa401e3ba3  We would like to thank all those who have always trusted and loved the EBCoin.  We were deeply distressed by the unexpected accident that happened on Coinrail which was the exchange for listing EBCoin. This refers that the cryptocurrency market still has a long way to go, which means there are a lot of risks all the way to the mainstream market.  In order to meet the expectation of our customers, we were in a hurry to rush to list as soon as possible. The listing decision on Coinrail Exchange was based on benchmarking several successful coins that listed on Coinrail. As mentioned above, we promise that our tokens are safely stored and our Foundation will be responsible for protecting the assets of our customers who transfer EBC tokens to Coinrail.  The EBCoin is currently undergoing a review for listing on large exchanges. This Coinrail accident has caused inconveniences and psychological discomfort of the customers, but it does not have much effect on the planning of the big project.  In addition, we are aware that there was a lack of public relations activities on the website or SNS channel in order to concentrate on listing. We will update the news in the future and fill in the missing parts.  The EBCoin Team is making a lot of progress in business such as the development of wallet, preparation of demonstration day, development of refund system, the establishment of our execution plan, and the alliance with major companies. But we were in the face of a few obstacles as we made one big step toward our goal. We will regard this issue as a lesson, and we will be the EBCoin Team who are faithful to the basics.  We hope you will look forward to being active again, and we will be happy to say good news soon.  News about the listing expected by many people will be delivered as soon as the future plan is concretely confirmed.  Thank you.

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: EBCoin Announces Future Listings and Launch of New Cryptocurrency Exchange  Today EBC Foundation, the company behind the blockchain Fintech project EBCoin, officially announced that they will launch a new cryptocurrency trading exchange based in Japan. They also announced negotiations to list their EBCoin currency (Symbol: EBC) on local Japanese exchanges BitFlyer, GMO and Zaif, soon after the conclusion of their crowd sale on February 13.  EBC Foundation originally planned to establish their exchange, KRPEX, in Korea. However, due to the rising regulatory uncertainty faced by digital currencies in Korea, the team set their sights on Japan as the preferred location. In contrast with Korea, Japan has been providing clear guidelines for establishing cryptocurrency exchanges since last year.  The group will work with their Japanese partner, Integro Welfare, who will facilitate the entire process to register and launch KRPEX. Of course, the new exchange will also list EBC Foundation's own EBCoin currency against various other currency trading pairs.  The Japanese Yen is currently the top Bitcoin trading currency in the world, accounting for 56.2 percent of the total trading volume of Bitcoin against fiat currency. The Japanese government in April 2017 introduced legislation to officially recognize cryptocurrency as a payment method equivalent to fiat currencies such as the Yen or the US Dollar.  https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ebcoin-announces-future-listings-and-launch-of-new-cryptocurrency-exchange-300592446.html

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: EBCoin - Making Tax Refunds Easier for Tourists, Launching Exchange in Japan  EBcoin is a blockchain-based project all about making the tax refund process easier and more transparent for international travelers. Additionally, they also want to make the process essentially instant - something they hope to do by leveraging blockchain tech to make it more decentralized. The listings on the exchanges will happen soon after their crowd sale ends on February 13, 2018.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/ebcoin-to-open-new-exchange-in-japan/

Author: CryptoDad2017
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: The team is currently finalizing some very significant multi-national partnerships who have vast experience in working with governmental entities. The concept has also been pitched to the Korean government and the reception was very favorable.  For most of the countries concerned, the government makes these incentives available to encourage tourism and bring foreign wealth into their country. Working with EBCoin becomes a logical step with no disadvantages to them. Think of it from their perspective... You would be working along with a reputable global company, they have a successful and completed product, it will easily integrate with their local travel tax refund program, and using a cutting edge product that is already popular with tourists.  It's a win-win situation, so I don't think we should expect much resistance to adoption.

Author: CryptoDad2017
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: Yes. The implementation of EBCoin will have to be done on a per country basis. This is needed, not just for authorization, but also because each country's tax refund system works slightly different.  Remember though, that even if a specific country does not agree to their customs using EBCoin, EBCoin will still be able to be used as a payment method for participating duty-free retailers. These contracts will be negotiated with the merchants and the payment gateway service providers in that specific country.  Further than that, partnerships with local FOREX services who have kiosks in airports can also be done regardless of customs integration. That will enable the local conversion of EBCoin to FIAT currency.  So, in other words, even without customs integration, the EBCoin platform still has many uses for the international traveller.

Author: CryptoDad2017
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: Good questions! EBCoin will be integrated with merchants at the payment gateway solution level. In other words, payment terminals at the point-of-sale usually can accept a variety of cards. Visa, Mastercard, JCB, Debit, Credit, Chip, Tap, etc. These terminals will be enabled to also accept EBCoin (EBC) as a payment option, just like any of the others available.  Along with that, merchants can create a "loyalty program" based on EBC tokens. eg. Spend over $100 and get 100 EBC tokens as a reward. This also opens up the possibility for system wide EBC rewards sponsored by EBC Foundation. eg. "Pay with EBC 10 times this month and we'll give you 200 EBC tokens to spend how you wish."  That is the advantage of tokenizing a solution. You can leverage it for many different uses.

Author: CryptoDad2017
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: If you take a look at the roadmap on the website, you will see that the ATM implementation is something that is part of the long term plan for the project. At the moment it is scheduled for Q3, Q4 2019. That is a realistic timeframe considering how large of a task it will be.  Gaining approval for placing ATMs in Airports or opening a Kiosk is not an uncommon request made to Airport authorities. The space will be leased via the same process as other retailers, vendors, banks and service kiosks who already operate at airports around the world.  EBCoin will also be leveraging relationships and partnerships with existing Foreign Exchange Kiosk operators in other countries, as well as payment gateway providers. These partnerships will make it a lot easier to get any needed local authorizations for offering EBCoin as a truly global solution. There will be great financial incentive for these providers to partner with EBCoin, as it will increase their transaction volume significantly.

Author: superjeyy
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: That's true Gerrard Yang! ICOs nowadays seems to be similar with one another, they just have different strategies in selling and advertising their projects. I am so excited with EBCoin!! Traveling is what my family does often and as I noticed, we always have trouble in redeeming our tax refund as it takes a lot of processes and time which can be used for touring or bonding abroad. I had an experience where they wouldn't allow me to get my tax refund right away just because my credit card wasn't Visa. We had to be at the airport early on the day we left since the lines for the refund were extremely long. Through EBCoin this complications can be resolved and shopping abroad would be a lot easier. I am so happy I get to promote a project that I truly know lives by efficiency and transparency!

Author: themathiasmiller
Title: [ANN - ICO] EBCoin: The Best Gift For Travelers
Body: I just read the whitepaper and I honestly applaud you guys for undertaking a project as big as this, the tax refund system has a lot of problems but due to the fact that it's very complicated to solve and not a lot of people are aware with what's happening with the tax system in every specific country in the world, this topic is rarely talk about and just often been forgotten by a lot of people. Honestly I just knew through your whitepaper that there is up to $24 billion in sales tax refunds that are unclaimed by travelers, that's a huge amount of money that's been put to waste so that's why when I read your vision, I realize how important this project is, not just towards people who are traveling but towards the community as a whole, with this project people can save a lot of money and they can actually reap the benefits of the tax refund system in their own country. This project's goals are huge and might take time to develop but seeing that the team is composed of a group of people who are experienced in their own field and who are very passionate to bring this project to the top and knowing that this project is already in partnership with a lot of successful and big companies, there's no doubt that this project will be huge in the months to come. I just have a few questions though, how does the loyalty program works? And how can merchants integrate this project into their business?
